FuncDef: This command configures the LDAPsearchcommand. The searchbase-dntells the server which part of the external directory tree to search. The search DN uses the same LDAP attribute asroot-dn. For example, to search a public-key for an SSH generated for a Nokia vendor, one might use "dc=public-key,dc=nokia,dc=com".

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the base domain name used in the search, up to 512 characters.
